programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Chan has a showdown with Chandra and Cheryl and reveals the truth about his supposed affair with an ex-colleague. Olivia is delighted when Rose's reunion with her estranged father turns out better than expected. Grace still feels hurt after being ostracised by Christine and finds an unlikely ally in Rahmat.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Some of us love durians but are we having too much of a good thing? Steven Chia goes on a durian diet to find out what it does to his body! And we send durians to be tested for nutritional content.

programme.title: World's Wildest Weather S1
programme.desc: From freak tornadoes appearing out of nowhere, to pounding storms with hailstones the size of footballs... this fast-paced, adrenaline-filled, and shocking documentary series charts some of the most extreme weather from around the globe. Mixing first-person witness statements, expert commentary, user-generated content, CGI and science, it's a memorable examination of some of the wildest weather systems ever seen.

programme.desc: 在哈萨克斯坦和吉尔吉斯斯坦，有一族群自称为东干人。说的是古老的陕西和甘肃话。来到异乡，马背民族的豪爽天性，感染了离乡背井的东干人，风霜雨露，落地生根。让我们跟着线人一起了解东干人的文化和目前生活状况.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 43 岁的 马宝凤手忙脚乱，照顾着三个患有多动症的孩子和年迈的父母。她的父亲患有痴呆症，她的母亲患有关节炎。 翻新援助行动能否给这个家庭一个崭新、安全的家园，重新开始.

programme.title: 梦想假期2
programme.desc: 出国度假对一些人来说是梦寐以求的事。职责所在、需要24小时坚守岗位、不够经费，每天从早到晚忙碌于工作的人想度假更是难上加难。《梦想假期》收到公众秘密提名，主持人温淑安将在每一集带一位不惜劳苦的工作人士到国外度假并帮助他们完成心中的梦想度过一个惊喜难忘的梦想假期。最好玩的是度假基地将保密直到出发前一刻才会公布.
